Quote: Maybe you are incompetent than I gave you credit for. I just heard from old Milly up the road that her husbands has fallen ill again.
I suppose you will be staying here for now. As soon as this mess is over I expect to hear a different voice behind that mask.
What? Ill again? I cured all the villagers unless . . . Unless it is mutated.
Or possibly it incubated in the man before and he has only gotten the symptoms now.
Not my job to know why. All I know is that you have more work to do.
So you better get out there and finish the job though I understand you may lack of experience with that . . .
